name: Ninja's Course!
description:
This is a simple ninja platformer made and created by Gdevelop 5 

make sure to run the project application when extracted!

my email:

jonathanbanks792@gmail.com

controls:

Hold w to hover so you can hover over obstacles

hold D to go right

Hold A to go left

And there is a easter egg you have to find out what key it is this is the selection of keys: QWERTY only one of them has the special song hint: its the song tommyinnit played in a apple store
